scripts.build: concurrent -p command "npm run build-js" "npm run build-css"
scripts.build-css: lessc assets/site.less | postcss -c postcss.json | ntee dist/site.css | cleancss -o dist/site.min.css
scripts.build-js: browserify . -d --extension=.jsx | ntee dist/bundle.js | uglifyjs - -c warnings=false -m | ntee dist/bundle.min.js | gzip > dist/bundle.min.js.gz
scripts.watch: concurrent -p command "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-browser"
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && onchange assets/** -- npm run build-css
scripts.watch-js: watchify src/browser.jsx -d --extension=.jsx -v -o "ntee dist/bundle.js | uglifyjs - -c warnings=false -m | ntee dist/bundle.min.js | gzip > dist/bundle.min.js.gz"
